title: WTB Sid Farrar or Willard Mains
author: carrigansghost

posts.post_title: WTB Sid Farrar or Willard Mains
posts.post_content:
I would love a cheap version of each to go along with some memorabilia to be framed. Feel free to let me know what cheap means to you.

Rawn

I have an original George Grantham Bain photo of Farrar from about 1910 that is cheap, $35 or so.  I also have one of his Old Judge cards but it is pretty nice.

Rhys

[url]themodo@hotmail.com[/url]

Thank you both for the information.

Rawn
Not real cheap but the price is very negotiable...[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/pwg1.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks Leon, but the price is a bit out of my range. I'm looking for between $100-$250 range. I love seeing the card again though.

Rawn

I have the following Farrar that would land just outside the high range you listed...

[IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/n172farrar.JPG[/IMG]

feel free to email me at [url]rhettyeakley@netzero.com[/url] if there is any interest
